title: DISABLED PBE ACCOUNT
body: An account i hardly use, because well most of the updates don't concern Lux{{champion:99}} , I don't bother to play PBE, but now when I try to sign in, it's disabled, yet i was never toxic or anything, there's not any types of holds on the account, or a mention as to why its disabled, please help, i want to try the new runes. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: No worries just yet! Reach out to our account agents in a recovery [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your main NA account that's attached to your PBE account. After verifying yourself, they should be able to help reactivate the PBE side for you.
